Profile


As a motivated and enthusiastic IT professional I have 12 years in system administration and support. From these roles I acquired strong problem solving, organisational skills, and general understanding of IT. In the last few years, I have also invested personal time in learning front-end web technologies. 

I am aiming to bring my skills and experience to a dynamic web development team.
